chunk: Ingredients: Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice, Glycerin, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Fruit Water, Water, Polyglyceryl-4 Caprate, Decyl Glucoside, Lycium Chinense Fruit Extract, Morus Alba Root Extract, Carica Papaya (Papaya) Fruit Extract, Gaultheria Procumbens (Wintergreen) Leaf Extract, Sodium PCA, Sucrose Laurate, Levulinic Acid,

book: 0268-Planted in Beauty PURIFY + CONDITION MAKEUP REMOVER

chunk: Directions: AM/PM As the first step of the double cleanse process, apply Purify + Condition Makeup Remover to a clean cotton pad and gently sweep over dry face and neck to remove face makeup and environmental debris. With a clean pad, gently wipe eye area. Rinsing off the skin with water is not necessary; follow with Soothe + Soften Cleansing
book: 0268-Planted in Beauty PURIFY + CONDITION MAKEUP REMOVER

chunk: over dry face and neck to remove face makeup and environmental debris. With a clean pad, gently wipe eye area. Rinsing off the skin with water is not necessary; follow with Soothe + Soften Cleansing Emulsion or Polish + Resurface Detox Exfoliant to complete a thorough cleansing of the skin.
